00112 template <typename T>
00113 void AVLTree<T>::insert_node_avl(typename BSTree<T>::BinTree &tree, const T& value){
00114   std::stack<typename BSTree<T>::BinTree*> nodes;
00115   insert_node_avl_helper(tree, value, nodes);
00116 }

00118 /*****************************************************************************/
00130 /*****************************************************************************/
00131 template <typename T>
00132 void AVLTree<T>::insert_node_avl_helper(typename BSTree<T>::BinTree &tree, const T& value, 
00133   std::stack<typename BSTree<T>::BinTree*> &nodes){
00134   // perform insertion the same as a BSTree
00135   if (tree == 0)
00136   {
00137     tree = this->make_node(value);
00138     tree->count++;
00139     BSTree<T>::size_++;
00140     balance_tree(nodes);
00141   }
00142   else if (value < tree->data)
00143   {
00144     nodes.push(&tree); //push visited node
00145     tree->count++;
00146     insert_node_avl_helper(tree->left, value, nodes);
00147   }
00148   else
00149   {
00150     nodes.push(&tree); //push visited node
00151     tree->count++;
00152     insert_node_avl_helper(tree->right, value, nodes);
00153   }
00154 }

00167 /*****************************************************************************/
00168 template <typename T>
00169 void AVLTree<T>::remove_node_avl(typename BSTree<T>::BinTree &tree, const T& value){
00170   std::stack<typename BSTree<T>::BinTree*> nodes;
00171   remove_node_avl_helper(tree, value, nodes);
00172 }

00174 /*****************************************************************************/
00186 /*****************************************************************************/
00187 template <typename T>
00188 void AVLTree<T>::remove_node_avl_helper(typename BSTree<T>::BinTree &tree, const T& value, 
00189   std::stack<typename BSTree<T>::BinTree*> &nodes){
00190   if (tree == 0)
00191   {
00192     return;
00193   }
00194   else if (value < tree->data)
00195   {
00196     nodes.push(&tree); //push visited node
00197     tree->count--;
00198     remove_node_avl_helper(tree->left, value, nodes);
00199   }
00200   else if (value > tree->data)
00201   {
00202     nodes.push(&tree); //push visited node
00203     tree->count--;
00204     remove_node_avl_helper(tree->right, value, nodes);
00205   }
00206   else // tree->data == value
00207   {
00208     if (tree->left == 0)
00209     {
00210       typename BSTree<T>::BinTree temp = tree;
00211       tree = tree->right;
00212       this->free_node(temp);
00213       balance_tree(nodes); //balance after remove
00214     }
00215     else if (tree->right == 0)
00216     {
00217       typename BSTree<T>::BinTree temp = tree;
00218       tree = tree->left;
00219       this->free_node(temp);
00220       balance_tree(nodes); //balance after remove
00221     }
00222     else
00223     {
00224       typename BSTree<T>::BinTree pred = 0;
00225       this->find_predecessor(tree, pred);
00226       tree->data = pred->data;
00227       tree->count--;
00228       remove_node_avl_helper(tree->left, tree->data, nodes);
00229     }
00230   }
00231 }

00233 /*****************************************************************************/
00243 /*****************************************************************************/
00244 template <typename T>
00245 void AVLTree<T>::balance_tree(std::stack<typename BSTree<T>::BinTree*> &nodes){
00246   while (!nodes.empty())
00247   {
00248     typename BSTree<T>::BinTree &node = *(nodes.top());
00249     nodes.pop();
00250     int leftheight = BSTree<T>::tree_height(node->left);
00251     int rightheight = BSTree<T>::tree_height(node->right);
00252     if (std::abs(rightheight - leftheight) > 1)
00253     {
00254       // if unbalanced on the right
00255       if (rightheight > leftheight)
00256       {
00257         typename BSTree<T>::BinTree &right = node->right;
00258         // if right child is unbalanced on left
00259         if (BSTree<T>::tree_height(right->left) > BSTree<T>::tree_height(right->right))
00260         {
00261           // perform a right rotation about right child
00262           rotate_right(right);
00263           // and a left rotation about node
00264           rotate_left(node);
00265         }
00266         else // right child is unbalanced on right
00267         {
00268           rotate_left(node);
00269         }
00270       
00271       }
00272       else //unbalanced on left
00273       {
00274         typename BSTree<T>::BinTree &left = node->left;
00275         // if left child is unbalanced to right
00276         if (BSTree<T>::tree_height(left->left) < BSTree<T>::tree_height(left->right))
00277         {
00278           // perform a left rotation about left child
00279           rotate_left(left);
00280           // and a right rotation about node
00281           rotate_right(node);
00282         }
00283         else // left child is unbalanced to left
00284         {
00285           rotate_right(node);
00286         }
00287       }
00288     }
00289   }
00290 }

00292 /*****************************************************************************/
00302 /*****************************************************************************/
00303 template <typename T>
00304 void AVLTree<T>::rotate_right(typename BSTree<T>::BinTree &tree){
00305   typename BSTree<T>::BinTree temp = tree;
00306 
00307   unsigned tempcount = temp->count;
00308   unsigned rightcount = 0;
00309   unsigned leftchildcount = 0;
00310 
00311   if (tree->right) rightcount = tree->right->count;
00312   if (tree->left && tree->left->right)
00313      leftchildcount = tree->left->right->count;
00314 
00315   tree = tree->left;
00316   temp->left = tree->right;
00317   tree->right = temp;
00318 
00319   temp->count = rightcount + leftchildcount + 1;
00320   tree->count = tempcount;
00321 }
00322 
00323 /*****************************************************************************/
00333 /*****************************************************************************/
00334 template <typename T>
00335 void AVLTree<T>::rotate_left(typename BSTree<T>::BinTree &tree){
00336   typename BSTree<T>::BinTree temp = tree;
00337 
00338   unsigned tempcount = temp->count;
00339   unsigned leftcount = 0;
00340   unsigned rightchildcount = 0;
00341 
00342   if (tree->left) leftcount = tree->left->count;
00343   if (tree->right && tree->right->left)
00344     rightchildcount = tree->right->left->count;
00345 
00346   tree = tree->right;
00347   temp->right = tree->left;
00348   tree->left = temp;
00349 
00350   temp->count = leftcount + rightchildcount + 1;
00351   tree->count = tempcount;
00352 }
